directions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat; cook and stir eggplant, zucchini, onion, celery, and red bell pepper until tender, 10 to 15 minutes. Add cider vinegar, tomato paste, garlic, curry powder, salt, and oregano; simmer until liquid is slightly reduced, 5 to 10 minutes.
title: Ratatouille with Curry
